page.title: 18A TYPICAL SATURDAY
page.content: {Mrs.Margaret Tears lives at Lough {House,}with her husband,{George,who {was born there}and their 2 daughters {Elizabeth and Ruth.}On a typical Saturday she gets up at about 8am to feed and water the hens then tackles the weekly wash.After a quick lunch she shops in Alnwick.They collect sandwiches from Cookson's and go to Alnmouth for a picnic tea and a romp on the beach.On their return they have a cooked meal,usually fish,or rissoles for Elizabeth.After an evening of household chores the girls are in bed by about 9 and Mr.Tears,an undertaker follows about 11.{Mrs.Tears then has {time to relax.With a cup of coffee,she {either reads a favourite book(Miss {Read's'Village'books currently) or {does some work on her miniatures, {dolls,dolls'house furniture etc.before {going to bed about 1am.
